product_description: AI-powered nutrition and health coaching platform with Pat AI assistant
target_users: Health-conscious individuals seeking personalized nutrition guidance
People looking to track and optimize their daily energy expenditure (TDEE)
Users wanting AI-powered meal logging and macro calculation
Fitness enthusiasts and those working with personal trainers

key_features.name: AI Chat Assistant (Pat)
key_features.description: Conversational AI assistant for nutrition advice, meal planning, and health guidance

key_features.name: Meal Logging & Macro Tracking
key_features.description: Log meals with automatic macro calculation using multiple data sources (USDA, branded products, Gemini AI)

key_features.name: TDEE Calculation
key_features.description: Calculate Total Daily Energy Expenditure based on user profile and activity level

key_features.name: User Dashboard
key_features.description: Personalized dashboard showing progress, meals, and health metrics

key_features.name: Voice Integration
key_features.description: Text-to-speech for AI responses and voice input capabilities

key_features.name: Multi-Agent AI System
key_features.description: Swarm AI system with different personalities and specialized agents

key_features.name: Admin Panel
key_features.description: Administrative interface for managing users and system settings

key_features.name: Trainer Features
key_features.description: Tools for personal trainers to manage their clients

user_stories: As a user, I want to chat with Pat AI to get nutrition advice
As a user, I want to log my meals and see automatic macro calculations
As a user, I want to know my TDEE to plan my daily calorie intake
As a user, I want a personalized dashboard showing my health progress
As a trainer, I want to manage multiple clients and their data
As an admin, I want to manage user roles and system settings
acceptance_criteria: Users can successfully authenticate and access the platform
Pat AI responds appropriately to nutrition-related questions
Meal logging shows accurate macro calculations
TDEE calculations are based on proper formulas and user data
Dashboard displays relevant health metrics and progress
Voice features work across supported browsers
Admin panel allows proper user and system management
technical_requirements: Supabase for backend services and authentication
Multiple nutrition data providers (USDA, branded products, AI)
